types:type.name: customers_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type customers_json = {| customerId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, firstName: String, lastName: String, emailId: String, password: String, phoneNo: String, "creationDate?": String, "createdBy?": String, "lastUpdatedDate?": String, "lastUpdatedBy?": String |} {"example": "{\\\"customerId\\\":1,\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"William\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Whatson\\\",\\\"emailId\\\":\\\"willam@abc.com\\\",\\\"password\\\":\\\"jjndfj\\\",\\\"phoneNo\\\":\\\"1238455\\\",\\\"creationDate?\\\":\\\"2021-09-03\\\",\\\"createdBy?\\\":\\\"Ben\\\",\\\"lastUpdatedDate?\\\":\\\"2021-09-03\\\",\\\"lastUpdatedBy?\\\":\\\"John\\\"}"}

types:type.name: addCustomer_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type addCustomer_json = {| firstName: String, lastName: String, emailId: String, phoneNo: String, password: String, statusId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, "creationDate?": String, "createdBy?": String, "lastUpdatedDate?": String, "lastUpdatedBy?": String |} {"example": "{\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"William\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Whatson\\\",\\\"emailId\\\":\\\"willam@abc.com\\\",\\\"phoneNo\\\":\\\"1238455\\\",\\\"password\\\":\\\"dfkkkk\\\",\\\"statusId\\\":1,\\\"creationDate?\\\":\\\"2021-09-03\\\",\\\"createdBy?\\\":\\\"Ben\\\",\\\"lastUpdatedDate?\\\":\\\"2021-09-03\\\",\\\"lastUpdatedBy?\\\":\\\"John\\\"}"}

types:type.name: getSubscription_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type getSubscription_json = {| subscriptionId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, departureTime: String, arrivalTime: String, fromStation: String, toStation: String, startDate: String, serviceType: String, route: String, timePeriod: Number {"typeId": "int"}, userId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, serviceId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, alertService: String, delayStatus: String, statusTypeId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, status: String, "creationDate?": String, "createdBy?": String, "lastUpdatedDate?": String, "lastUpdatedBy?": String |} {"example": "{\\\"subscriptionId\\\":1,\\\"departureTime\\\":\\\"12:30:00\\\",\\\"arrivalTime\\\":\\\"12:30:00\\\",\\\"fromStation\\\":\\\"ABC\\\",\\\"toStation\\\":\\\"DEF\\\",\\\"startDate\\\":\\\"2020-05-09\\\",\\\"serviceType\\\":\\\"delayNotification\\\",\\\"route\\\":\\\"BYI\\\",\\\"timePeriod\\\":30,\\\"userId\\\":9,\\\"serviceId\\\":8,\\\"alertService\\\":\\\"alert\\\",\\\"delayStatus\\\":\\\"delayed\\\",\\\"statusTypeId\\\":2,\\\"status\\\":\\\"active\\\",\\\"creationDate?\\\":\\\"2021-09-03\\\",\\\"createdBy?\\\":\\\"Ben\\\",\\\"lastUpdatedDate?\\\":\\\"2021-09-03\\\",\\\"lastUpdatedBy?\\\":\\\"John\\\"}"}

types:type.name: alertData_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type alertData_json = {| alertId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, emailNotify: String, delayStatus: String, statusType: String, estimatedTime: String, locationName: String, "creationDate?": String, "createdBy?": String, "lastUpdatedDate?": String, "lastUpdatedBy?": String |} {"example": "{\\\"alertId\\\":444,\\\"emailNotify\\\":\\\"Notified\\\",\\\"delayStatus\\\":\\\"Delayed\\\",\\\"statusType\\\":\\\"active\\\",\\\"estimatedTime\\\":\\\"12:00:00\\\",\\\"locationName\\\":\\\"LBG\\\",\\\"creationDate?\\\":\\\"2021-09-03\\\",\\\"createdBy?\\\":\\\"Ben\\\",\\\"lastUpdatedDate?\\\":\\\"2021-09-03\\\",\\\"lastUpdatedBy?\\\":\\\"John\\\"}"}

types:type.name: userAuthentication_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type userAuthentication_json = {| username: String, password: String |} {"example": "{\\\"username\\\":\\\"william@abc.com\\\",\\\"password\\\":\\\"williaM@123\\\"}"}

types:type.name: signIn_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type signIn_json = {| username: String, password: String |} {"example": "{\\\"username\\\":\\\"william@abc.com\\\",\\\"password\\\":\\\"williaM@123\\\"}"}
